Отзывы Подзаголовок

ОАО Татнефть, tatneft.ru

This letter of reference refers to the performance of the Crude Oil Tank TK-110 cleaning by ARKOIL Technologies Nederland B.V. (hereafter referred as ARKOIL) for BP Raffinaderij Rotterdam B.V. (hereafter referred as BP).

Генеральный директор, Петров С.А

Задача

ARKOIL Technologies Nederland is one of the largest professional oil service companies, which developed and provides exclusive and unique systems to clean crude tanks and recover oil, and cure heavily oil-contaminated land plots all over the world.

ARKOIL Technologies Nederland is one of the largest professional oil service companies, which developed and provides exclusive and unique systems to clean crude tanks and recover oil, and cure heavily oil-contaminated land plots all over the world.
